title: For Sale T216 Kotton Collection 14 different

posts.post_title: For Sale T216 Kotton Collection 14 different
posts.post_content:
For sale 14 different T216 Kotton cards, prices are shipped with signature, PayPal FF or add 3% for goods.

Rebel Oakes GAI 2, total population 12, sold

Admiral Schlei SGC 1.5 Highest graded, I believe this is a tougher paper version, total population 2, sold

Jeff Sweeney SGC 2, total population 17, sold
